## Goal
Upgrade the referral application workflow with multi-stage tracking, automated reminders, in-app messaging, and feedback/rating systems.

## Tasks
- [ ] Extend Prisma schema for application stages, messages, reminders
- [ ] Implement backend logic for status transitions and reminders (cron jobs)
- [ ] Build messaging UI for referrer-applicant communication
- [ ] Add feedback and rating system for applications
- [ ] Integrate notifications for status updates and reminders
- [ ] Write tests for workflow transitions and messaging

## Acceptance Criteria
- Applications progress through all stages with timestamps
- Reminders and notifications are sent automatically
- Messaging and feedback features are functional and secure
